title: Spirit Guard Udyr
body:
Not sure if this is the right board for this, but here it goes.

When someone's playing Spirit Guard Udyr in my games, whenever he changes form/spirit, my screen freezes for half a second. I mean literally every time he does it. How can I fix this? I nearly lost a match because of this. (coupled with server lag lol OCE servers op)

replies.body: It happened to me too: I was just playing Dominion with my friends. I played Spirit Guard Udyr {{champion:77}} . Me and one of them has experienced that same bug. Others said it was just fine for them. Now imagine we had to coordinate whether my friend was making plays or not so I could change my stances :P
It's really annoying. :\  It only started happening when the new patch came live.
